divs: Sighting DetailsBetweem 9 and 10 pm I was laying in bed looking out at the Ocean as I was on vacation,as I was laying there I saw a orange light in the sky at first I thought it was a star then it moved.The object seemed to move from one spot to another in the sky without leaving any trail,very fast almost like disappear then reappear.It moved vertical in a diagonal direction then descended a bit.All this happening in about a 3-4 minute span after moving the object disappeared completely,so I layed back down in bed after about a minute or two the object reappeared above the ocean.This time I got up put on pants and went out on the deck after a couple movements again by the object it again disappeared.I then went back inside and went to sleep later that night sometime I reawoke it was out there again this time I ignored it and went back to sleep.It never reappeared the rest of my vacation in Yachats.
Summary: Star like UFO over ocean Yachats Oregon
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Yachats
There were no other sightings in Yachats on or around February 22nd 2012
